&lt;3.title: <3
info: +1 Health Up
Fully restores all red heart containers
&lt;3.tags: boss room pool, boss room item, item room, treasure room, item room pool, red heart, ballchinnian, ball sack, full heal, gluttony, the lost item pool

???'s Only Friend.title: ???'s Only Friend
info: A familiar fly that can be moved around via use of the arrow keys dealing contact damage, similar to the Ludovico Technique's mechanic.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.
???'s Only Friend.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Boss Rush with Blue Baby.
???'s Only Friend.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool, blue fly, big fly, blue baby's only friend

1UP.title: 1UP
info: Gives the player an extra life
When revived, the green mushroom that follows Isaac will disappear and he will respawn with the same amount of red heart containers at full health.
Resurrection takes place before all other items which give you an extra live, except Guppy's Collar.
1UP.tags: secret room pool, mario, green mushroom,

info: Isaac now shoots from both eyes at the same time.
Unlike the Inner Eye and Mutant Spider items, this double shot item does not give a tears down, effectively giving you double damage per second potential.
20/20.tags: 20 20, item room, treasure room, item room pool, black glasses, spectacles

3 Dollar Bill.title: 3 Dollar Bill
info: Random tear effect for every room.

Possible tear effects: Fire Mind, Spoon Bender, My Reflection, Ouija Board, 20/20, Inner Eye, Iron Bar, Death's Touch, Scorpio, Tough Love, Proptosis, Number One, Mom's Contacts, Ball of Tar, Dark Matter, Speed Ball or Sagittarius.
3 Dollar Bill.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool, pink note, money, cash,

9 Volt.title: 9 Volt
info: Automatically gives you 1 bar of charge after using your spacebar item.
Fully recharges your current spacebar item when picked up.
Causes the Sharp Plug item to become useless due to the fact that you can never have 0 charge on your spacebar item.
Any items which are normally a 1 room recharge are now timed instead.
9 Volt.tags: shop room pool, shop item pool, battery, black, brown,

Abaddon.title: Abaddon
Abaddon.pickup: Evil up + DMG up + fear shot
info: On pickup removes all of your red hearts and gives you 6 black hearts.
+1.5 Damage Up.
+0.2 Speed Up.
Tears now have a chance to induce the fear effect, causing enemies to run away from Isaac for a short period.
The chance to fear enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +85 Luck it will activate every time.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
Abaddon.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Azazel.
Abaddon.tags: devil pool, devil room pool, devil deal, red devil sign, abandon, abadon

Abel.title: Abel
info: A familiar that mirrors the player's movements and shoots tears in the opposite direction.
Abel's tears do the same as Isaac's base damage (3.5).
Abel.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Cain.
Abel.tags: golden chest pool, gold chest pool, item room, treasure room, item room pool, follower, northernlion, everyone knows it's abel, brown, grey, gray,

Anarchist's Cookbook.title: Anarchist's Cookbook
info: Spawns troll bombs at random locations around the room.
Anarchist's Cookbook.tags: library pool, library room, book room pool, item room, treasure room, item room pool, white, red

Anemic.title: Anemic
info: +5 Range Up.
When Isaac takes damage, he will start to leave a trail of blood creep behind him as he walks for the current room.
Lazarus' revived form (Lazarus II) respawns with this item.
Anemic.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool, blood drop, red blood

Ankh.title: Ankh
info: Upon death, the player respawns as Blue Baby with three Soul hearts.
This is a one time use item and all new heart containers will be soul hearts.
Can be used to unlock some of Blue Baby's secrets before having the character available.
Ankh.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool, black, grey, gray, extra life

Anti-Gravity.title: Anti-Gravity
info: +0.32 Tears Up.
As you hold down the fire button, shots will float in the same place until you release the fire key again.
Allows you to store up a lot of tears in the air and release them all at once.
When the tears are released, they will fire off in the direction that Isaac was originally facing when it was created.
Anti-Gravity.tags: anti gravity, item room, treasure room, item room pool, anti gravity,

Aquarius.title: Aquarius
info: Leaves a trail of tears on the floor behind Isaac which damages enemies that walk over it.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
Aquarius.tags: astrology, astronomy, item room, treasure room, item room pool, black, blue, cyan

Aries.title: Aries
info: +0.25 Speed up.
Gives huge horns which stick out, allowing you to deal 18 contact damage if you hit something with enough speed.
Will not deal contact damage unless you are moving fast enough.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
Aries.tags: astrology, astronomy, item room, treasure room, item room pool, black, blue, cyan

Ball of Bandages.title: Ball of Bandages
info: Gives Isaac an orbital ball of bandages that blocks shots, very similar to the Cube of Meat.
Collecting a second Ball of Bandages in the run turns the orbital into a pink head that shoots tears which have a chance to charm enemies.
Getting a third Ball of Bandages will transform the head into bandage girl which will chase enemies while firing charm tears.
A fourth Ball of Bandages will make the Bandage Girl bigger and stronger, making her deal more damage.
Any futher Ball of Bandages will repeat the cycle.
Charmed enemies will prioritize attacking other enemies in the room, otherwise they will still attack Isaac.
Has a chance to drop from one of the Horsemen bosses and can be received from using Monster Manual.

Ball of Tar.title: Ball of Tar
info: Isaac leaves a trail of tar behind him which will slow down enemies that walk over it.
Tears have a chance to slow enemies and their projectiles for a short period of time.
The chance to slow enemies can improve based on your luck stat and will always slow enemies at +18 Luck.
Ball of Tar.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool, black,

The Battery.title: The Battery
info: All spacebar items can now be 'overcharged', allowing them to be charged up twice instead of once.
The extra charges appear in yellow on top of the normal green bars.
The Battery.tags: shop room pool, shop item pool,

BBF.title: BBF
info: A large familiar black fly that bounces around the room, exploding on contact with enemies dealing 70 damage.
Does not explode if it hits Isaac, however if it explodes on an enemy while Isaac is in range, he will take damage.
Respawns after a short period of time.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.
BBF.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool,

The Bean.title: The Bean
info: Upon use, this item causes Isaac to fart and poison any enemies in close proximity.
The Bean deals 26 damage total (5 initially then 21 in a Damage over Time effect.
The Bean.tags: normal beggar pool, normal judgement pool, coin beggar pool, coin judgement pool, item room, treasure room, item room pool, team bean, #teambean

The Belt.title: The Belt
info: +0.3 Speed Up.
The Belt.tags: boss room pool, boss room item,

Best Bud.title: Best Bud
info: When Isaac takes damage, a white attack fly will spawn that orbits him at a similar distance to the Distant Admiration fly.
The fly orbits a lot faster than Distant Admiration or Forever Alone.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.
Best Bud.tags: key master pool, key beggar pool, key judgement pool, item room, treasure room, item room pool, the lost item pool

Best Friend.title: Best Friend
info: Places a decoy on the floor which attracts enemies and explodes after a period of time.
When it explodes, it deals 110 damage to everything in radius (Same damage as Mr Mega bombs).
Best Friend.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool, worst friend

BFFS!.title: BFFS!
info: Makes all of Isaac's familiars much bigger, making them deal more damage.
Causes all familiars to deal double damage (x2 / +100%).
Has no effect on Rotten Baby, which instead benefits from Hive Mind.
BFFS!.tags: key master pool, key beggar pool, key judgement pool, shop room pool, shop item pool,

The Bible.title: The Bible
info: Gives Isaac angel wings for the current room, allowing him to fly.
If used during the Mom's Foot or Mom's Heart boss fights, The Bible will kill Mom instantly.
If used during the Satan boss fight, The Bible will instantly kill Isaac.
The Bible.tags: library pool, library room, book room pool, angel room pool, god room pool, angel room item, shop room pool, shop item pool,

Big Fan.title: Big Fan
info: A very large orbital that moves around Isaac very slowly, blocking shots and dealing contact damage.
Affects the speed of all other orbitals, slowing them down a lot.
Does not count as one of your three standard orbitals, allowing you to have a total of 4.
Can block and prevent damage from Brimstone lasers.
Picking up this item as well as 2 other fly-type items will allow you to transform into Lord of the Flies.
Big Fan.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

The Black Bean.title: The Black Bean
info: Upon taking damage, Isaac will fart, causing all enemies in close proximity to become poisoned.
Black Bean deals 26 damage total (5 initially then 21 in a Damage over Time effect.
The Black Bean.tags: normal beggar pool, normal judgement pool, coin beggar pool, coin judgement pool, item room, treasure room, item room pool, the lost item pool

Black Candle.title: Black Candle
info: +1 Black Heart.
Immunity to all floor curses (e.g. Curse of the Lost)
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
An item that can appear in the shop room or in a Curse Room.
Higher chance of a Devil Deal opening after the boss fight (Approximately +25% through testing).
Black Candle.unlock: Unlock this item by donating 150 pennies to the Shop.
Black Candle.tags: curse room pool, shop room pool, shop item pool,

Black Lotus.title: Black Lotus
info: +1 Health Up.
+1 Soul Heart.
+1 Black Heart.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
An item only found in the secret room pool.
Black Lotus.tags: secret room pool, , the lost item pool

Blank Card.title: Blank Card
info: When used, copies the effect of the tarot card you are currently holding.
The Blank Card can also be used to mimic mystic runes as well as tarot cards.
An item that often appears in the shop.
Blank Card.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Eden.
Blank Card.tags: secret room pool, shop room pool, shop item pool, item room, treasure room, item room pool

Blood Bag.title: Blood Bag
info: +1 Health Up
Heals for 5 full red hearts.
Unlike the original game, this item is NOT a Speed Up.
Has a chance to drop while playing any Blood Donation machine.
Blood Bag.unlock: Unlock this item by playing the Blood Donation machine 30 times.

Blood Clot.title: Blood Clot
info: +1.0 Damage Up.
+5 Range Up.
The above stats only apply to tears fired from Isaac's left eye or with a 50% chance if you have an item which causes you to fire from a single source only.
Blood Clot.tags: boss room pool, boss room item,

Blood of the Martyr.title: Blood of the Martyr
info: +1.0 Damage Up.
1.5x Damage Multiplier if you also have Book of Belial (Does not stack with Magic Mushroom multiplier)
This item can only be found in the item room pool, unlike the original game where it was also an Angel Room item.
Blood of the Martyr.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

Blood Rights.title: Blood Rights
Blood Rights.pickup: Mass enemy damage at a cost
info: Upon use, takes away one full heart and deals 40 damage to the entire room.
With the Isaac's Heart item, you can use Blood Rights without taking damage.
Blood Rights.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Samson.
Blood Rights.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

Bloody Lust.title: Bloody Lust
info: Each time you take damage, you gain a damage up which lasts for the rest of the floor and turn a darker red colour each time.
After taking 6 hits you will cap at +6.5 Damage for the rest of the floor.
Damage given for each hit increases as follows: +0.5, +0.5, +0.5, +1.66, +1.66, +1.66.
Bloody lust works differently in Rebirth - Damage is given for taking damage and is persistent for the entire floor.
Bloody Lust.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Samson.
Bloody Lust.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool, the lost item pool

Blue Cap.title: Blue Cap
info: +1 Health Up.
+0.7 Tears Up.
-0.16 Shot Speed Down.
An item only found in the Boss Room pool.
Blue Cap.tags: boss room pool, boss room item, mushroom, fungi, fungus,

Blue Map.title: Blue Map
info: Reveals the locations of the secret and super secret room for the current floor and all future floors.
Blue Map.unlock: Unlock this item by donating 10 pennies to the Shop.
Blue Map.tags: normal beggar pool, normal judgement pool, coin beggar pool, coin judgement pool, shop room pool, shop item pool,

Bob's Brain.title: Bob's Brain
info: A green brain that launches in the direction you are firing your tears and will explode on contact with enemies, dealing damage and poisoning anything in the blast radius.
Bob's Brain can deal anywhere between 67.5 - 69.5 damage and this will scale with further bomb upgrade items.
Regenerates over time.
Will hurt Isaac if he is in the blast radius.
Bob's Brain.tags: golden chest pool, gold chest pool, item room, treasure room, item room pool

Bob's Curse.title: Bob's Curse
info: All of Isaac's bombs now leave a poison effect on any enemies within the blast radius.
+5 Bombs.
As well as dealing the standard 60 damage for a bomb, it will apply a Damage over Time effect that does 4 or 6 damage per tick.
Bob's Curse.tags: boss rush pool, boss rush room, item room, treasure room, item room pool, bob sloth

Bob's Rotten Head.title: Bob's Rotten Head
info: A poison bomb which can be thrown and leaves a poison effect on any enemies within the blast radius.
The bomb deals 50 damage on hit and leaves a damage over time poison effect that does 6 or 8 damage per tick.
Synergizes with tear modifying items such as My Reflection or Tiny Planet.
Bob's Rotten Head.tags: golden chest pool, gold chest pool, item room, treasure room, item room pool, bob sloth

Bobby - Bomb.title: Bobby - Bomb
info: All of Isaac's bombs now having a homing effect when placed on the floor.
+5 Bombs.
Bobby - Bomb.tags: boss rush pool, boss rush room, item room, treasure room, item room pool

The Body.title: The Body
info: +3 Health Up.
The three heart containers are pre-filled with red hearts.
The Body.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with The Lost.
The Body.tags: angel room pool, god room pool, angel room item, item room, treasure room, item room pool, real platinum god, the lost item pool

Bogo Bombs.title: Bogo Bombs
info: All bomb pickups are now 1+1 bombs.
An item only found in the Shop item pool.
Bogo Bombs.tags: shop room pool, shop item pool,

Bomb Bag.title: Bomb Bag
info: A bag of bombs that will drop a bomb pickup every 2 rooms.
Bomb Bag.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Cain.
Bomb Bag.tags: boss rush pool, boss rush room, secret room pool, item room, treasure room, item room pool

The Book of Belial.title: The Book of Belial
info: Upon use, gives +2 damage up which lasts for the current room.
1.5x Damage Multiplier if you also have Blood of the Martyr (Does not stack with Magic Mushroom multiplier).
Guaranteed Devil or Angel Room if used when you kill the boss on all floors where it's possible to get one.
Judas starts with this item.
The Book of Belial.tags: library pool, library room, book room pool, devil pool, devil room pool, devil deal

Book of Revelations.title: Book of Revelations
info: Upon use, gives Isaac an extra Soul heart.
Using this item gives you a higher chance of finding a horsemen boss at the end of the floor.
Higher chance of a Devil Deal opening after the boss fight (Exact chance unknown).
Book of Revelations.unlock: Unlock this item by beating one of the horsemen bosses for the first time.
Book of Revelations.tags: library pool, library room, book room pool, item room, treasure room, item room pool, the lost item pool

Book of Secrets.title: Book of Secrets
info: When used, you have a chance of getting one of the three following effects: Treasure Map (floor layout), Compass (map icons) or Blue Map (secret room locations)
Book of Secrets.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Eden.
Book of Secrets.tags: library pool, library room, book room pool, secret room pool, item room, treasure room, item room pool, question mark book

Book of Shadows.title: Book of Shadows
info: Gives the player an invulnerability effect which lasts for a few seconds.
Book of Shadows.tags: library pool, library room, book room pool, item room, treasure room, item room pool

The Book of Sin.title: The Book of Sin
info: Spawns a random pickup on the floor.
The possible pickups from this item include: Bombs, hearts, keys, coins, pills, batteries or tarot cards.
The Book of Sin.unlock: Unlock this item by beating each of the Seven Sins once.
The Book of Sin.tags: library pool, library room, book room pool, devil pool, devil room pool, devil deal, item room, treasure room, item room pool, red 7 book

Boom!.title: Boom!
info: +10 Bombs
Boom!.tags: boss rush pool, boss rush room, item room, treasure room, item room pool

Boomerang.title: Boomerang
info: A blue boomerang which can be thrown in a similar fashion to Mom's Knife, to stun any enemies it hits and deal 7 damage.
The boomerang can also be used to grab pickups and consumables from a distance, similar to the legend of zelda boomerang.
The range of the boomerang is affected by range, with number one the distance is very short and makes the item a lot less effective.
Boomerang.tags: shop room pool, shop item pool,

Box.title: Box
info: Spawns one of each type of pickup.
Pickups spawned: 1 heart, 1 key, 1 bomb, 1 coin, 1 card, 1 pill and 1 trinket.
Box.tags: dungeon room, challenge room pool, blood challenge room, arena pool, normal beggar pool, normal judgement pool, coin beggar pool, coin judgement pool, boss room pool, boss room item,

Box of Spiders.title: Box of Spiders
info: When used, spawns 2-4 friendly blue spiders on the floor.
Blue Spiders do 2.5x of Isaac's damage.
Box of Spiders.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

Breakfast.title: Breakfast
info: +1 Health Up.
Breakfast.tags: dungeon room, challenge room pool, blood challenge room, arena pool, normal beggar pool, normal judgement pool, coin beggar pool, coin judgement pool, boss room pool, boss room item, the lost item pool

Breath of Life.title: Breath of Life
info: While you hold the spacebar down with this item, it will de-charge gradually and when the charge bar gets to zero it will grant you a brief period of invincibility.
If the spacebar is held for too long (about 1 second) when it has no charge, you will take damage.
Breath of Life.tags: angel room pool, god room pool, angel room item

Brimstone.title: Brimstone
info: Tears are replaced with the ability to charge and fire a powerful laser that travels in a straight line across the room, dealing a lot of damage (damage * 13) to any enemies it comes into contact with.
Does not directly affect your Damage stat but hits enemies 13 times per charge.
Synergizes very well with a lot of items including Tammy's Head, Tiny Planet, Inner Eye (Triple Shot), Mutant Spider (Quad Shot) and many others.
An item only found in the devil room pool (Note: The Fallen boss pulls items from the Devil Room Pool)
Brimstone.tags: devil pool, devil room pool, devil deal

Broken Watch.title: Broken Watch
info: Upon entering a new room, you now have a chance to randomly slow down or speed up all enemies in the room.
An item only found in the Shop item pool.
Broken Watch.tags: shop room pool, shop item pool,

Brother Bobby.title: Brother Bobby
info: A familiar which follows Isaac and shoots normal tears which do 3.5 damage.
Brother Bobby.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool, devil pool, devil room pool, devil deal

Bucket of Lard.title: Bucket of Lard
info: +2 Health Up.
-0.2 Speed Down.
Of the two heart containers given from this item, only 1/2 a red heart of them is filled.
Bucket of Lard.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool, the lost item pool

Bum Friend.title: Bum Friend
info: A beggar who follows Isaac around and automatically picks up nearby coins. After picking up a coin he has a random chance to drop pickups, including hearts, keys, bombs, coins, pills, cards or trinkets.
Bum Friend.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

Butt Bombs.title: Butt Bombs
info: +5 bombs.
Bombs now become poop bombs, which deal 10 damage to all enemies in the room and daze them for a short period of time.
Butt Bombs.tags: boss rush pool, boss rush room, item room, treasure room, item room pool

Butter Bean.title: Butter Bean
info: When used, farts on nearby enemies and knocks them backwards away from Isaac.
Butter Bean.unlock: Unlock this item by destroying 100 poops.
Butter Bean.tags: normal beggar pool, normal judgement pool, coin beggar pool, coin judgement pool, item room, treasure room, item room pool

Caffeine Pill.title: Caffeine Pill
info: +0.3 Speed Up.
Player Size Down.
Gives you a random pill when picked up.
An item only found in the boss room pool.
Caffeine Pill.tags: boss room pool, boss room item, pro plus

Cain's Other Eye.title: Cain's Other Eye
info: A familiar eye that bounces around the room slowly and fires tears in the same direction as Isaac.
Cain's Other Eye deals 3.5 damage per tear (The same as Isaac's base damage).
Cain's Other Eye.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Boss Rush with Cain.
Cain's Other Eye.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool, eyeball

Cancer.title: Cancer
info: +3 Soul Hearts
After getting hit once, you gain a damage reduction for the rest of the room similar to The Wafer item (-50% damage taken).
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
Cancer.tags: astrology, astronomy, item room, treasure room, item room pool, cyan, black, the lost item pool

The Candle.title: The Candle
info: A spacebar item which allows Isaac to fire a blue flame that damages anything in its path for 23 damage per tick.
Can cause up to a total of 184 potential damage.
The Candle.unlock: Unlock this item by donating 900 coins to the Shop.
The Candle.tags: shop room pool, shop item pool, blue candle,

Capricorn.title: Capricorn
info: +1 Health Up.
+0.5 Damage Up.
+0.16 Tears up.
+0.1 Speed Up.
+1.5 Range Up.
+1 Key, +1 Bomb, +1 Coin.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
Capricorn.tags: astrology, astronomy, item room, treasure room, item room pool, cyan, black,

Cat-O-Nine-Tails.title: Cat-O-Nine-Tails
info: +1.0 Damage Up.
+0.23 Shot Speed Up.
An item only found in the Boss room pool.
Cat-O-Nine-Tails.tags: boss room pool, boss room item,

Celtic Cross.title: Celtic Cross
info: Upon taking damage, you have a chance to gain an invulnerability shield for a few seconds.
The chance to gain a shield is affected by your luck stat and at +27 Luck it will activate every time.
Celtic Cross.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Maggy.
Celtic Cross.tags: angel room pool, god room pool, angel room item, item room, treasure room, item room pool, the lost item pool

Ceremonial Robes.title: Ceremonial Robes
info: +3 Black Hearts.
+1 Damage Up.
When depleted, Black Hearts deal 40 damage to the entire room, in a Necronomicon style effect.
Ceremonial Robes.itempool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Demon Beggar
Ceremonial Robes.tags: curse room pool, demon beggar pool, demon judgement pool, devil beggar pool, devil pool, devil room pool, devil deal

Champion Belt.title: Champion Belt
info: +1.0 Damage Up.
Increases the chance of champion enemies appearing.
An item only found in the Shop room pool.
Champion Belt.tags: shop room pool, shop item pool,

Charm of the Vampire.title: Charm of the Vampire
info: Heals half a heart after every few enemies killed.
Charm of the Vampire.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool, the lost item pool

Chemical Peel.title: Chemical Peel
info: +2 Damage Up for tears fired from Isaac's left eye.
If you have an item which modifies which eye you fire tears from, each shot has a 50% chance to do +2 Damage.
Chemical Peel.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

Chocolate Milk.title: Chocolate Milk
info: Isaac can now charge shots for more damage by holding down the fire button.
At full charge, your tears do 4 times more damage.
Tears up - Spamming the fire button allows for rapid fire shots at normal damage.
Chocolate Milk.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

The Common Cold.title: The Common Cold
info: Tears now have a random chance to apply a poison effect, causing 4 or 6 damage per tick to enemies.
The chance to fire poison shots is affected by your luck stat and at +12 Luck it will activate every time.
Gives a big increase in damage to Dr. Fetus bombs.
The Common Cold.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

The Compass.title: The Compass
info: Shows all icons on the map (e.g. Shop)
Does not show the layout of the map.
Room icons will not show if a curse of the blind is in effect on the current floor.
The Compass.tags: normal beggar pool, normal judgement pool, coin beggar pool, coin judgement pool, shop room pool, shop item pool,

Contract From Below.title: Contract From Below
info: Doubles your pickup drops including chests, soul hearts and all other consumables which spawn at the end of a room.
Higher chance for 'double trouble' rooms (2 bosses at once).
Contract From Below.itempool: Devil Room, Curse Room, Demon Beggar
Contract From Below.tags: curse room pool, demon beggar pool, demon judgement pool, devil beggar pool, devil pool, devil room pool, devil deal

Converter.title: Converter
info: When used, converts 2 soul or black hearts into 1 red heart container.
This item will take from your soul hearts first.
Converter.tags: shop room pool, shop item pool, the lost item pool

Crack The Sky.title: Crack The Sky
info: Creates 5 beams of light at random locations in the room, dealing 20 damage to any enemies which come into contact with them.
The beams tend to favour spawning in the middle of the room but also have a chance to spawn infront of an enemy.
Crack The Sky.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

Cricket's Body.title: Cricket's Body
info: +0.16 Tears Up.
-10.0 Range Down.
Makes tears break into 4 smaller tears on impact with anything which deal half of your damage.
Cricket's Body.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

Cricket's Head.title: Cricket's Head
info: +0.5 Damage Up
x1.5 Damage Multiplier.
Tears now have a significant knockback effect (Does not increase the shot speed stat).
Can be found in golden chests.
Cricket's Head used to be known as 'Max's Head in the original game and was renamed for Rebirth.
Cricket's Head.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool, golden chest pool, gold chest pool,

Crystal Ball.title: Crystal Ball
info: Upon use, reveals the entire map and gives the player a random tarot card, mystic rune or soul heart.
Has a chance to drop from playing a fortune machine.
Crystal Ball.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool

Cube of Meat.title: Cube of Meat
info: An orbital which blocks shots and damages enemies it comes into contact with.
Exclusively drops from one of the horsemen bosses.
2 cubes of meat transform the orbital into a meat head which fires blood tears.
3 cubes of meat transform it into a meat boy familiar that walks around and deals contact damage to enemies.
4 cubes of meat cause the meat boy familiar to grow in size and do more damage.
Cube of Meat.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Mom for the first time.

Cupid's Arrow.title: Cupid's Arrow
info: Isaac's tears now have a piercing effect which allows them to travel through enemies whilst damaging them.
Cupid's Arrow.tags: item room, treasure room, item room pool, arrow, penetrative, penetrating shots

Cursed Eye.title: Cursed Eye
info: Tears are now charged up and fired rapidly in a burst of up to 4 shots at once.
The amount of tears fired in the charge depends on how long you charge for.

The eye has three states, white (not firing), black (first second of charging) and blinking between black and white. If you get hit while Cursed eye is a solid black colour you are guaranteed to be teleported to another random room on the floor. If you get hit in either of the other 2 states you will not be teleported.
Cursed Eye.tags: secret room pool, item room, treasure room, item room pool

D4.title: D4
info: When used, the D4 re-rolls your items into another item from the same pool.
Each time an item is generated by the D4, it is also removed from the pool. When the pool is empty, it will eventually re-roll all your items into heart containers.
Cannot remove Azazel's Brimstone laser.
D4.unlock: Unlock this item by blowing up 30 slot machines.

The time it takes for the effect to activate becomes shorter with a higher base Speed stat.

-35% Damage Down.

Allows you to loop through and the final floor infinitely. If you can get Undefined to teleport you to an I AM ERROR room, there will be a beam of light that takes you back to a new Chest/Dark Room floor with the same layout and refreshed rooms.

info: A random chance when you take damage to get an invincibility shield for a few seconds (Similar to the Celtic Cross effect but more likely).
The chance to get an invincibility shield is affected by your luck stat and at +10 Luck it will activate every time you get hit.
Gives you the PhD effect, turning all negative pills into positive ones.
One of the twelve zodiac items available in the game.
Virgo.tags: astrology, astronomy, item room, treasure room, item room pool

The Virus.title: The Virus
info: Deals poison damage on contact with enemies (Damage over time 4 or 6 per tick).

The Wafer.title: The Wafer
info: Lowers all damage taken by half rounding up to the nearest half-heart.

Sets your speed stat to 1.5 if it isn't already that high.

The charge of the spacebar attack deals 40 damage on contact with enemies.
Drops from the Conquest boss fight.
